Name: Deadly Threat
About the game: Deadly Threat is an action-adventure game with RPG and first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to control the hero and explore mysterious locations in the dungeon. You have to go through a dangerous dungeon and fight various monsters and bosses alone. Use powerful weapons to fight back the Ancient Lich who is ready to destroy your world. Recently, he got out to freedom and is ready to raise an army of the dead to destroy everything in his path. And only you can stop it.
Meta Title: Deadly Threat: May 11, 2021, Robbie Hogan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Deadly Threat? Check out the release date (May 11, 2021), developer insights from Robbie Hogan, and a complete game summary.
